Room.Name: Paladin Test Arena
Room.ShortDescription: You have been chosen to advance to a level four paladin. Be prepared to defeat the knight in green, who is already at level four. You should pray.
Room.LongDescription: The knight before you will test your abilities, and will not let you pass to the training room if you are found lacking in skill. Only the bravest and purest of paladins may serve the kingdom, and if you search your soul and find you are not ready, you should come back at a later time.
